    • Method Detail

      • getSecurityContexts

        public static java.lang.Object getSecurityContexts​(matrix.db.Context context)
        The method returns the default security context of the user who has sent the request to display the PQR report in the widget
        Parameters:
        context - the Enovia Context object
        Returns:
        The default security context of the logged in user

      • getMEPSEPDetailsJSON

        public static java.lang.String getMEPSEPDetailsJSON​(matrix.db.Context context,
                                                    java.lang.String[] args)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method creates the JSON object for the MEPS dropped in the widget. the input parameters are:
        Parameters:
        context - The enovia Context object
        args - Should have values for 'Allowed types', 'Allowed States', 'MEP ID'
        Returns:
        JSON object consisting of the information to be displayed on the PQR widget for the ID's dropped
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When operation fails

      • getAllowedStates

        public static java.lang.String getAllowedStates​(matrix.db.Context context,
                                                java.lang.String strAllowedStates)
                                         throws matrix.util.MatrixException
        The method has the following input parameters: Request from the session strAllowedStates: The Allowed states from the settings file Returns: The display name for the list of states
        Parameters:
        context - The enovia context object
        strAllowedStates - comma separated list of policy.state names
        Returns:
        json with policy.state name mapped to display value of the state
        Throws:
        matrix.util.MatrixException - when operation fails
